channel.title: Comments on: ফাতিমার ঘরে উমর – এক অনন্ত যুদ্ধের সুচনা
channel.description: জ্ঞান যেখানে সীমাবদ্ধ, যুক্তি যেখানে আড়ষ্ট, মুক্তি সেখানে অসম্ভব

item.title: By: Shafi
item.dc:creator: Shafi
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/archives/23330#comment-4174">Fahim</a>.
Ohi stopped because Muhammad/Allah waited one month to see if Ayisa gets pregnant. Once it was clear that she is not pregnant, ohi starts pouring again. Its as simple as that.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Fahim.

Ohi stopped because Muhammad/Allah waited one month to see if Ayisa gets pregnant. Once it was clear that she is not pregnant, ohi starts pouring again. Its as simple as that.

item.title: By: Bellal
item.dc:creator: Bellal
item.description: অন্ধকারে জগৎ রহস্যময় মনে হয়।আলো দিয়ে জগতের রহস্য গুলো নষ্ট করার দরকার কি।থাকুক না কিছু রহস্য।
item.content:encoded: অন্ধকারে জগৎ রহস্যময় মনে হয়।আলো দিয়ে জগতের রহস্য গুলো নষ্ট করার দরকার কি।থাকুক না কিছু রহস্য।

item.title: By: Fahim
item.dc:creator: Fahim
item.description: At the point of Ayisa ( radiallhu anha) and Ali ( kormollahu uajhu).....you asked why Ohi was stop?.....the answer is that Ohi come when Allah wants.......2nd ....any kind of problem between Sahabi ( radiallhu anhu).....I said all of them are right.....it is better for you to study Islam more before too much questions...thank you.
item.content:encoded: At the point of Ayisa ( radiallhu anha) and Ali ( kormollahu uajhu)…..you asked why Ohi was stop?…..the answer is that Ohi come when Allah wants…….2nd ….any kind of problem between Sahabi ( radiallhu anhu)…..I said all of them are right…..it is better for you to study Islam more before too much questions…thank you.
